Text: Hey Nepotu, I just want to say thanks for your work in uploading the NBA games, especially the 1gb versions. I wouldnt be able to watch them here in Ireland otherwise. Thank you sir. GO HEAT!
You're welcome, mate! Cheers to Ireland!

Dear Friend, How are you?
Hope things are going strong for you...
Your work is breathtaking....
You're the best!
KEEP VERY WELL
Can't wait to get back to internet.... 
I miss your amazing passion for sports and keeping the world happy... Maybe you're the next messiah....
